Question Text:
You have a requirement to create a set of filter conditions on the Incidents list to show the records that satisfy the following conditions:
●	Incidents where the state is Resolved or Closed;
●	Incidents where the Assignment Group is one of your groups.

Correct Answers & Selections: Click AND button; define the second condition; click Run.

Question Text: Which of the following describes the relationship between the Problem and the Task tables?

Question Text:
In your implementation, the following tables extend each other:
●	The Configuration Item [cmdb_ci] table extends the Base Configuration Item [cmdb] table.
●	The Service [cmdb_ci_service] table extends the Configuration Item [cmdb_ci] table.
●	The Business Service [cmdb_ci_service_business] table extends the Service [cmdb_ci_service] table.
Based on the above mapping, which table(s) are child, parent and/or base tables?
Selection Criteria: Select 4 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Base Configuration Item table is a Parent table. + Configuration Item table is a Parent table. + Base Configuration Item table is a Base table. + Service table is a Child table. + Service table is a Base table. + Base Configuration Item table is a Child table. + Business Service table is a Parent table. + Business Service table is a Base table.
Correct Answers & Selections: Base Configuration Item table is a Parent table. + Configuration Item table is a Parent table. + Base Configuration Item table is a Base table. + Service table is a Child table.

Question Text: Which field on a Configuration Item (CI) record is recommended for routing Incidents to the appropriate group to resolve CI-related incidents quickly?
Selections: Assignment Group + Approval Group + Support Group + Managed By Group + Change Group

Question Text: What are the three key attributes of every field?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Field Label + Location + ID + Value + Field Name

Question Text:
The VIP value for a user is set to true on the [sys_user] table. The user is listed as the Caller of an incident.
Which of the following statements are true in a baseline platform configuration?
Selection Criteria: Select 2 Answers from the below options.
Selections: "The users name is shown in red in the Caller field." + "The SLA workflow conditions for VIP trigger additional notifications to the manager of the Assignment group." + "A VIP decoration is displayed next to the Caller field." + The priority field calculation is adjusted to increase Priority by 1.
Correct Answers & Selections: "The users name is shown in red in the Caller field." + "A VIP decoration is displayed next to the Caller field."

Question Text: Where can fulfillers navigate to find catalogue tasks assigned to them and their groups to fulfil requests?
Selection Criteria: Select 2 Answers from the below options.
Selections: All > Service Catalog > My Groups Work + All > Service Desk > My Work + All > Service Catalog > My Work + All > Service Desk > My Groups Work
Correct Answers & Selections: All > Service Desk > My Work + All > Service Desk > My Groups Work

Question Text: An update set is a group of configuration changes that can be moved from one instance to another; however, not everything is captured. Which of the following are automatically captured in an update set?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Roles + Schedules + Fields + Views + Tasks

Question Text: What do you use to control access to features and capabilities in ServiceNow applications and modules?
Selections: Company + Organisation + Group + Department + Role

Question Text: How can one user temporarily become another user for testing purposes?
Selections: Select a user to impersonate with the User Picker in the banner. + Open the User menu and select the Impersonate User menu item. Select a user to impersonate. + Open User Administration > Impersonate User and select a user to impersonate. + Open the User menu and select the Elevate Roles menu item. Select a user to impersonate. + Open User Administration > Users, select a user, and click the Impersonate User related link.
Correct Answers & Selections: Open the User menu and select the Impersonate User menu item. Select a user to impersonate.

Question Text: Who has access to create, edit or delete sorting criteria in Visual Task Boards?
Selections: Users with vtb_admin role + The owner of the board + Primary and additional assignees of the board cards + All board members

Question Text: Which of the following is a key difference between Reporting and Performance Analytics?
Selections: Performance Analytics is a replacement for the legacy ServiceNow Reporting functionality. + Reports can be run on a scheduled basis; Performance Analytics cannot. + Performance Analytics can show trends; Reports cannot. + Reports can generate accurate historical trends; Performance Analytics is limited in time. + "Performance Analytics answers the question of Where are we today?; Reports answer Where do we want to be?." + Performance Analytics data can be published to dashboards; Reports cannot. + Performance Analytics can show snapshots of data taken over time; Reports can only show the current snapshot of data.
Correct Answers & Selections: Performance Analytics can show snapshots of data taken over time; Reports can only show the current snapshot of data.

Question Text: Which of the following definitions corresponds to Service Catalogue?
Selections: It contains a collection of orderable products and services. + Products placed in the shopping cart + A customised interface used to build and submit an order + A collection of one or more ordered items
Correct Answers & Selections: It contains a collection of orderable products and services.

Question Text: What is the purpose of Embedded Help on the ServiceNow platform?
Selection Criteria: Select 4 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Provide specific written or video-based instructions for a custom application + "Provide help if the users preferred language is English" + Display content based on query parameter values + Coach users on using a custom application + Display content based on user role
Correct Answers & Selections: Provide specific written or video-based instructions for a custom application + Display content based on query parameter values + Coach users on using a custom application + Display content based on user role

Question Text: Which of the following can be used to create configuration items (CIs) in the CMDB?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Creation via service catalogue fulfilment processes + Creation via the incident management process + Creation triggered by asset management + Creation via the change management process
Correct Answers & Selections: Creation via service catalogue fulfilment processes + Creation triggered by asset management + Creation via the change management process

Question Text: What happens if you select Publish when creating knowledge articles manually or by import?
Selections: It triggers the publish workflow assigned to the knowledge base. + The articles are sent for approval. + The articles are sent for review. + The articles are automatically moved to a Published state.
Correct Answers & Selections: It triggers the publish workflow assigned to the knowledge base.

Question Text: (Washington DC) What ServiceNow product allows you to create request-fulfilment applications without writing code?
Selections: ServiceNow Studio + App Engine Studio + Guided Application Creator + Creator Studio

Question Text: What are the possible data source file formats for an import set?
Selection Criteria: Select 4 Answers from the below options.
Selections: TXT + XML + CSV + JSON + XLSX

Question Text: Which module allows you to customise your instances' banner image, browser tab title and background colour?
Selections: Reports > Administration > Color Definition + Now Experience Framework > Themes + System UI > UI Pages > Branding + Service Portal > Headers & Footers + Conversational Interfaces > Branding and Chat Menu + System Properties > Basic Configuration UI16

Question Text: What are the components of the Now Platform Core UI interface?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Content frame + Workspace + Banner frame + Application navigator + Sidebar
Correct Answers & Selections: Content frame + Banner frame + Application navigator

Question Text: Which of the following are the data visualisation formats in ServiceNow?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Databases + Tables + Dashboards + Form Charts + Reports

Question Text: How is it possible for a non-administrator to develop and deploy applications on the Now Platform?
Selections: It is not necessary for a non-administrator to develop or deploy applications. + Ask the administrators to do it since only administrators have this level of access. + It is not possible to develop or deploy applications in ServiceNow. + Use delegated development and deployment application.
Correct Answers & Selections: Use delegated development and deployment application.

Question Text: Which of the following should you do before importing data into ServiceNow?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Understand the data you plan to import. + Decide what to do with incomplete or erroneous data. + Determine which source data maps to which target fields. + Delete all the existing target table records to avoid conflicts.
Correct Answers & Selections: Understand the data you plan to import. + Decide what to do with incomplete or erroneous data. + Determine which source data maps to which target fields.

Question Text: What are the three reasons to use ServiceNow Mobile apps?
Selection Criteria: Select 3 Answers from the below options.
Selections: A global search to find people, services, items, and articles + Allows multiple logins to an instance + No authentication is required to access the data + Ability to submit, view, and update requests, issues, and tasks + Push notifications for instant access to critical information
Correct Answers & Selections: A global search to find people, services, items, and articles + Ability to submit, view, and update requests, issues, and tasks + Push notifications for instant access to critical information

Question Text: Which of the following are possible outcomes when coalescing detects a match between a record in the staging table and a record in the target table?
Selection Criteria: Select 2 Answers from the below options.
Selections: Halt the import and ask the user what to do. + Overwrite the record in the target table with the source data. + Create duplicate records. + Stop the import and delete the previously imported records. + Keep the record already in the target table.
Correct Answers & Selections: Overwrite the record in the target table with the source data. + Keep the record already in the target table.

Question Text: Which of the following describes creating a field on a table with Form Designer?
Selections: From the Fields tab, drag the field onto the form and configure the field. + Click the New Field button in the form section and configure the field. + From the Fields tab, drag the Fields type onto the form and configure the field. + Double-click Insert a new row... in the form to enter details for the new field. + From the Field Types tab, drag the field type onto the form and configure the field.
Correct Answers & Selections: From the Field Types tab, drag the field type onto the form and configure the field.

Question Text: Who can create additional ad-hoc tasks for a requested item?
Selections: The requester + Fulfillers with permissions + Any of the fulfillers + Any of the approvers
